release.action: Initial revision. This is a basic JBoss Seam cartridge. It extends the JSF cartridge. Required to be used with the EJB3 cartridge. Refer the booking-seam example under the samples folder of the andromda-plugins project for basic usage.

jboss-seam.jar cannot exist in the ear and war. This causes classpath issues and an error message when you have SFSB seam components. (Stateful session bean component should have a method marked @Remove @Destroy)
Added startup.xml xdoc thanks to hermida.
